post:
**[KnownHost, LLC](https://www.knownhost.com?src=letbf "KnownHost, LLC")** is a privately held firm that has been providing premium managed services since 2006, and more recently we've been expanding our unmanaged offerings significantly.  We own 100% of our equipment and have our own staff in the datacenter.

In 2020 we completed a massive datacenter overhaul/upgrade/migration of our flagship facility from Dallas, TX to Atlanta, GA for our dedicated server offerings so we can offer unmatched quality, speed, and reliability.  We also became an [EPA-certified green power provider](https://www.knownhost.com/blog/knownhost-officially-partners-with-epa/?src=letbf "EPA-certified green power provider").

We have a full line of the latest Xeon E, Xeon Scalable, AMD EPYC, and AMD Ryzen offerings.

DirectAdmin is available for **FREE** on all dedicated server packages.

DDoS protection is included with all servers at no extra charge!

**BGP optimized network for excellent routing!**

Private networking is available with all servers on a private port with your own VLAN.

**All servers include full access to a self-management panel for remote reboots, IPMI/console, OS reloads, bandwidth tracking, and more.  The panel supports sub-account access with permission control.**

In most cases setup is instant if you order the hardware as listed.  If you customize your server then setup is generally completed within a couple of hours.  We have onsite staff standing by to configure your server(s)!

Without further ado, here is this year's lineup:

_There are a few budget/cheap dedi deals at the bottom of this post available in very limited quantity._

All offers are valid through Monday or until out of stock.

## AMD Ryzen 5600x:
* AMD Ryzen 5 5600x (6 Cores + HT)
* 32GB DDR4 ECC RAM
* 2x 500G NVMe (PCIe 4.0)
* 30TB BW @ 1Gbps (public)
* 1Gbps Private Networking
* /29 IPv4 (5 usable)
* /64 IPv6

$119/mo
[Click Here to customize/Order](https://my.knownhost.com/order/config/index/atl-dedicated/?group_id=25&pricing_id=666&configoptions[152]=nocp&configoptions[192]=ryzen-5600x&configoptions[148]=swraid1&coupon=BFDEDI2021 "Click Here to customize/Order")
